attributes.action: allow eligible parents to obtain financial help with Childcare even if the child is cared for by a grandparent or other relative of the child.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment eligible parents can claim 80% of the cost of "approved" childcare to a maximum of £175 per week. However this doesn't count if the grandparents of the child provide the childcare, despite the fact many grandparents give up work to provide childcare and many parents pay the grandparents significant amounts of money to provide childcare. Not to mention the fact it is often the best thing for the child to be looked after by their grandparents. This should be changed.
